name: Dance Hero
description:
You challenged the leader of the Macabra clan on a DANCE OFF!!! Do you have what it takes to become part of the clan?

Use you S, D, F and J, K, L keys to hit the notes that will make you move like Michael Jackson (?) 

Follow for upcoming content!
